snippet: Researchers are investigating whether dogs share the more complex kind of memory like humans and a few other animals....
abstract: Dr Claudia Fugazza study in journal Current Biology suggests dogs remember actions of humans long after they take place, and may have more complex memories than suspected.
lead_paragraph: Researchers are investigating whether dogs share the more complex kind of memory like humans and a few other animals.

headline.print_headline: Your Dog Remembers More Than You Think
headline.main: Your Dog Remembers More Than You Think
